decision_conditions: The proposed non-material amendments to 224878FUL dated 20/09/2023 can be ACCEPTED as non-material amendments, in accordance with section 96a of the Town and Country Planning Act (1990), Government Guidance Greater flexibility for planning permissions (2010) and the Ealing Council Protocol for Non-Material Amendments following a grant of Planning Permission (2011).
description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment (S96a) to planning permission ref: 224878FUL dated 20/09/2023 for: Change of use of two existing HMO's at Nos 58 and 60 Western Avenue to two large houses in Multiple Occupation (HMO) with a combined total of 18 rooms and 18 occupants (Use Class Sui Generis). Amendment seeks reconfiguration of the second floor internal layout to achieve larger bedrooms for occupants
